   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
             $('.slider')._TMS({
                 pagNums: false,
                 duration: 1000,
                 pagination: true,
                 preset: 'diagonalFade',
                 slideshow: 6000,
                 numStatus: false,
                 banners: true,
                 waitBannerAnimation: false,
                 bannerShow: function (banner) {
                     banner
 				.css({ right: '-400px' })
 				.animate({ right: '0px' }, 400)
                 },
                 bannerHide: function (banner) {
                     banner
 				.animate({ right: '-800px' }, 800)
                 }
             });
         })
   </script>
